name: Cité d'Or
overview: Lost in the huge Inca pyramid, will you find the hieroglyphic room? Will you perceive the secret by finding the translation of these hieroglyphs, which will allow you to prolong your survival? Will you avoid pitfalls, by fighting against the flight of time? when the last hieroglyph has been engraved and when you have gathered all the objects necessary to open the doors of the Golden City, you will be freed from the spell it exercised over you.
